import {Outlet, Link, useNavigate} from "react-router-dom"; import {useSignOut} from "react-auth-kit"; const Layout = () => { const logout = useSignOut(); const nav = useNavigate(); let cookie = document.cookie; let username = '' let auth = false let href = '' if(cookie) { const token = cookie.split(';')[3] if(token) { const _auth = token.split(':')[1] if(_auth) { auth = true username = _auth[1].slice(3, _auth[1].length - 4) href = `/user/${username}/blogs` console.log(href) } } } const signOut = () => { logout() nav('/') } return ( <>

) }; export default Layout;
